category-def.name: de.tools400.rpgunit
category-def.label: iRPGUnit for IBM i
category-def.description: iRPGUnit for RDi 9.5.1.3+. This is the base component of iRPGUnit.

category-def.name: de.tools400.rpgunit.additions
category-def.label: iRPGUnit for IBM i (optional features)
category-def.description: Optional features of iRPGUnit for RDi 9.5.1.3+. The features listed here are optional. It is recommended to install the spooled file viewer, if you do not have installed the iSphere plug-in.

category-def.name: de.tools400.rpgunit.integration
category-def.label: iRPGUnit for IBM i (optional integration features)
category-def.description: Optional integration features of iRPGUnit for RDi 9.5.1.3+. The features listed here are interesting for iSphere and CMOne users. You should install these features, when you want to connect iSphere or CMOne and iRPGUnit.
